website_summaries.verdict: This powder can be mixed with your favorite drink or sprinkled on food.
pros: This product doesn't contain a lot of other ingredients
Doesn't have a taste or smell
Powder allows flexibility in how you take the product
cons: Doesn't come with a measuring spoon to help you determine serving portions

customer_reviews.title: If you use it right, it works!
customer_reviews.text: Garcinia Cambogia works well with a few cauviets. Garcinia works well when used with calcium acetate or citrate on an empty stomach for appetite suppression. I do intermittent fasting, and this product helps me eat during a 6 to 8 hour window each day. I do not feel hungry in the morning. I have found that this product can, when used properly, work so well that you forget to eat. A few times I ate only because I was getting a headache from not eating.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Vincent Harris

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of Bulk Supplements products and this is the first product that I am giving a negative review. I would love to lose about 5-7 pounds and I have heard a lot of good things about Garcinia Cambogia. However, this did not work for me. I used it for a solid 6 weeks and I haven't lost an ounce. It is worth mentioning that I workout 5-6x per week and eat a very healthy diet before I tried the GC.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Giles

customer_reviews.title: Quality powder supplement
customer_reviews.text: This a quality powder supplement. It is tasteless, odorless and mostly dissolves in water. The only complaint I have is that the zip lock style closure on the bag will not reseal. I had to find an alternate storage option (mason jar)as to ensure the freshness of the product.This,and the fact that it only dissolved to about 95%,is why I gave this item a 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Massengill Mafia

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent Fasting’s Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this an honest review after 2 weeks of purchase. It works. I feel less hungry and keeping my food portions intact with my weight loss plan. This works even better if you’re on an intermittent fasting plan. I don’t get hungry and lasts pretty good during IF window. I was looking for something that can break my plateau of weight loss and I found it. I got the veggie caps and it’s worth the money. Garcinia Cambogia is now a definite staple for my diet plan. Great buy indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cubas

customer_reviews.title: This product can be added straight to your tea. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product can be added straight to your tea. It will mostly dissolve but leaves a sediment at the bottom of the cup. You need to stir your tea throughout the drinking process.
customer_reviews.author: J Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works for me at suppressing my appetite
customer_reviews.text: This works! I've been looking for an appetite supressant that's nearly as good as the prescription phentermine, but without the feeling of being jacked up. Plus phentermine really messed with my concentration. When taken before meals I definitely feel less hungry and when I take these 2-3 times a day they work even better, consistency and all that.
customer_reviews.author: dementedlove

customer_reviews.title: surprised the crap out of myself today when I saw I had dropped another 4 pounds
customer_reviews.text: wasn't sure at first no real appetite suppression at regular dose so I bumped it up to 1/2 tsp 3 x daily 45 to 60 minutes prior to meal. surprised the crap out of myself today when I saw I had dropped another 4 pounds in only a week after 2 months of steady weight loss and getting muscle back at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Becareful. Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my shakes it made me sick to my stomach and dizzy I tried it three days and threw up hours later.. Since i stop I felt better.. If you have tender sysyem dont take it..
customer_reviews.author: Evangelist KEYSHIA L NORMAN

customer_reviews.title: Not super strong
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix well with water, tends to give it a weird taste but not noticeable whatsoever in smoothies or other drinks! I mix with my tea in the morning and it seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: alex.overberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great bag.
customer_reviews.text: 1/8th tsp in 600 calorie smoothies each morning (no breakfast). Seems to be curbing my appetite and I spotted storing additional fat. Hope this keeps up with proper diet and exercise. Bulk Supplements always has to quality products!
customer_reviews.author: TyFranc

customer_reviews.title: Great results.
customer_reviews.text: I take Garcinia Cambogia(HCA) and Hoodia. They definitely put a big dent in my hunger. I still get hungry but those really strong cravings that make me fall of my diet wagon are gone. It took about three days of taking this before I noticed a difference. If I take it after breakfast a small lunch will make me feel stuffed. Great results.
customer_reviews.author: mickster

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product worked better than the Keto products I tried. I am already losing weight by following the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: screaming deal for a good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a screaming deal, particularly since most suppliers have raised their prices a great deal since it has become more popular. The only thing is that it doesn't really dissolve well when I out it in my hot tea. It's not a defect in the product, just the way it is. But it is SO much cheaper than the pre loaded caps. If you eat cereal or oatmeal, you could just sprinkle it into your food.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleRed

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 3 days and so far I've had so much energy! I used to have to drink really strong coffee but now I don't need it, I mix it with my protein shake in the morning and I'm good to go all day! Doesn't give me jitters either, I have yet to see any weight loss as I have just started this but I'll keep you guys updated for sure! (:
customer_reviews.author: Liz19

customer_reviews.title: Very chalky and doesn’t mix well or taste good.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t mix well. Very chalky. Poor taste. I can cover up the taste a little but the chalky and non mixing can’t be helped. Wish my old brand was still sold since I don’t take pills well. Will not buy again and keep searching. Only tried twice so cant tell if it contributes to weight loss yet. Also no scoop which would be easier then having to calculate the right amount and find the teaspoon that coordinates closest to it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Caprice

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this along with my apple cider vinegar, and it is definitely helping me loose fat. I would definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Bgoss

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My appetite is gone after 4 days taking this supplement twice per day, I already eat to be healthy but not because I'm hungry and I'm still full of energy and loosing weight gradually without exercise or diet. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Yisyaz

customer_reviews.title: Garcinia Cambogia
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased Garcinia Cambogia from Bulk Supplements through Amazon. Since I have just begun taking this supplement, I can only give feedback as to what effects I have experienced. This supplement has curbed my appetite and I have observed that my "sweets" craving has decreased. I am hopeful that the supplement continues to provide these results which over time will impact my overall goal for weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy because that's what I needed
customer_reviews.text: EVERY single BulkSupplements product I've purchased and sampled have been splendid. This product in particular reminds me of a protein powder, though very feather-light. The taste is beige, if you will, and very bitter. However, it mixes very well. I've been taking it for 4 days, since Wednesday, and it is fantabulous! I will update in three weeks. However, because of another reviewer, I take it three times a day and I have 0 appetite. Zilch, zero, nada, none. I'm happy because that's what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyHalo

customer_reviews.title: Appetite suppressant, increased energy levels
customer_reviews.text: Quality product at a friendly price. I have been using this in my morning smoothie for about a week. I've noticed increased energy levels (if I do a little workout just after drinking it) and a marked change in my appetite control. No more mid-morning-half-a-meal snacking. :)
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: ... received as a free sample for review but I liked the product so well that I wound up purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: first received as a free sample for review but I liked the product so well that I wound up purchasing it anyway. seems to be working well so far to help curb cravings for carb's and to feel fuller, quicker, at meal time.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggermoon

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Helped Improve My Happiness!
customer_reviews.text: I know people usually start taking Garcinia Cambogia for weight loss, and, I admit, I was intrigued by this miracle weight loss herbal supplement. But my main reason for trying this was for the claims that it increased serotonin levels. For the month and a half that I have been taking this supplement, I have noticed that I feel more content and calm even though I have a lot going on. I am a full-time college student so I'm stressed and anxious at times, and I think this supplement has helped alleviate some of those feelings!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product mix in anything !
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can just mix this into anything. Came quickly and was less expensive than buying pills or other "garcinia shake" powders. I will definately be buying Bulk from now on for my supplment needs. I saw they have some of my favorite beauty care ingredients as well. Cant wait to try out making my own serums and creams to go along with my weight loss : )
customer_reviews.author: KMck

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works...better than pills for me. I added it to my smoothies and realized I was not eating/snacking mindlessly and felt a sense of fullness and energized. I thought the 60% HCA would not be as effective because the pills are usually higher but no...the powder was definitely just as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Soooreel

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product a few days ago. Supposedly it works to make you not hungry. I have been not eating much lately, maybe once a day, plus working my job a lot. So I can't tell if it is working. However the product is very much tasteless and eay to go down.
customer_reviews.author: Dakia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item...fast shipping...doesn't have a taste. Don't have to take a lot of it. I take it 2 times a day so far..I put it in my protein shake
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: ... and remains a little gritty but overall it is fine. Not really certain about the weight loss just ...
customer_reviews.text: I am in different about this when mixing with water or other drinks it clouds the color and remains a little gritty but overall it is fine. Not really certain about the weight loss just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: I am using this supplement and it shows the best mix for smoothies ever !
customer_reviews.text: I am using this supplement and it shows the best mix for smoothies ever !
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia A. Delamothe

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product for a week and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a week and have seen a difference in my appetite. I no longer feel the need to snack between meals and eat moderate meals. It will probably take some time to notice the reduce fat in my abdomen which is really my purpose to purchase the garcinia cambogia and for that reason I gave the product 4 star at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Fontes

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product.. I would buy this again, because it definitely reduced my weight, and I began to feel less hungry after consuming this powder. I would not recommend mixing this with water, though but just get a capsule making machine, an empty capsule packet and consume it.
customer_reviews.author: pr34657

customer_reviews.title: I've used Garcinia Cambogia before with good effect, but wanted to try the powder form
customer_reviews.text: I've used Garcinia Cambogia before with good effect, but wanted to try the powder form. I use a higher dose than recommended by the label (I use 1.5g, 3 times a day, 60-90 minutes before meals), and have seen a better impact with this than with some others brands. I take mine in water (calling it "dissolved" would be overstating things--I just accept that it's not going to taste great and chug it). I waned to add to this review: 2/3/17: I've been using this for over a month, and it's been great. Noticeably better than other brands I've tried. It's definitely helped curb cravings, and helped with my weight management. And, at these doses, it lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value for this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for this product. This product comes without all the fillers that i have found with other supplements. It mixes easily and does not have a bad taste. The size and cost of this product makes it more than worthy of a try since it works fantastically when used regularly and properly. Its a great addition to anyone's dietary supplement regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for joint pain
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my joints which is what I bought it for. Was skeptical at first because I had to wait a couple of days for it to work. Awesome product. Must buy for joint relief.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Hultman Desmidt (Rythe)

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I initially wanted to try this instead ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I initially wanted to try this instead of the Garcinia pills as those tend to be more expensive. This was definitely a great decision! It recommends that you take it 2-3 times a day just like the pills, but it lasts a lot longer. I use the recommended amount on the label. The powder doesnt smell and is pretty pure. Definitely recommend it and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Pure Garcinia
customer_reviews.text: After two days, the food cravings disappeared completely which helps a lot with midnight cravings. Started losing weight...we'll see after a month but I'm very happy not having the munchies all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Fishlegs

customer_reviews.title: Helps curb appetite
customer_reviews.text: Garcinia Cambogia helps curb my appetite , but I haven't lost any inches yet. I'm sure it will take a few days to see the results.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good price too
customer_reviews.text: If the garcinia product is reasonably fresh it should always work. Unlike many Garcinia suppliers, bulk supplements version continues to result in weight loss for myself and my patients. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: William Guy

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: As described. I use this product daily with 3 other supplements and am quite happy with the results. Mixes well with drink mixes, and is easy to take that way. Would be five stars, but I found the packaging to be lacking. Be prepared to dump it into an airtight container when you receive it. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Laila Ann

customer_reviews.title: No Plastic Scooper
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the product will do its job. The thing that ticks me off if that they don’t provide you with a plastic measuring Scooper. Like come on...I’m going to measure out 500 mg with a spoon ? It saves cost for them for more profit so I get it. It’s a business.
customer_reviews.author: dobrin dundarov

customer_reviews.title: Great quality products
customer_reviews.text: Everything I have gotten from this company has been great quality and they provide great information on each product in the Amazon store. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: E A R

customer_reviews.title: I actually seem to be loosing belly fat with this product.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work and its inexpensive. I hope it will also dissolve my kidney stones.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product really curbs the appetite, I'll definitely order again!

customer_reviews.title: ... several items from Bulk Supplements and I've been very happy with the quality of the product and the quick ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several items from Bulk Supplements and I've been very happy with the quality of the product and the quick shipping. I've only tried the Garcinia Cambogia for about 3 days now but I definitely feel a difference. I'll post again with an update once I've been on it for a while longer.

customer_reviews.title: Great pills but a little messy
customer_reviews.text: The product seems good but as soon as it arrived noticed it was a huge mess inside the bag, wasn't until after filling up a weeks worth of pill organizers that I discovered one or more capsules broke during shipping
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The capsules are really brittle. Some broke on the way to my house; Just okay. The bag does not close easily but that is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Bonner

customer_reviews.title: TBD
customer_reviews.text: Not as much of a bitter taste as I'd expected from other reviews, not that I'll be snacking on it solo. Jury's out on the efficacy due weight loss and appetite reduction, but it's only been a week.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D. Jager

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to tell if they're working. They're a little dusty but it's not that bad. I have Amazon Prime so they came fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: There were a lot of great reviews about Bulk Supplements and am I happy with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to try the Garcinia Gambogia in the powder form. It works for me whereas the capsules did not. There were a lot of great reviews about Bulk Supplements and am I happy with their product.
customer_reviews.author: Cher S

customer_reviews.title: This product mixes well and easily in water
customer_reviews.text: This product mixes well and easily in water. Has no flavor which is great if you want to mix it with anything other than water but are too worried the flavors of other brand name supplements may clash. Packaging is great as always. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fed

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve listened to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve listened! Most pills were broken and there was powder everywhere. I’m not even giving them another chance. Too bad because this brand is usually pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Regina’s Review

customer_reviews.title: This brand is a better, fresher quality than the other one I bought
customer_reviews.text: I tried another brand online and when I ran out I decided to try this brand. This brand is a better, fresher quality than the other one I bought. I purchased the capsules, which I open up and dissolve in juice. It curbs my appetite and gives me energy. I take 1 capsule twice a day (30 minutes before breakfast and dinner). I would definately recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Water soluble so no clumping or residue ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Water soluble so no clumping or residue at the bottom of your glass.
customer_reviews.author: Retirement Ready

customer_reviews.title: I lost 9lbs in one week!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a week and the results have been incredible! I have lost 9 pounds in one week! I am still using this product. When I am finished I will come back with an update. So far I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Khudaja Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, put it in my protein shake in the morning, definitely seems to curb my appetite, which should help with my weight loss goals. Overall Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Arturi

customer_reviews.title: I have to remind myself that I have to eat!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have tried many Garcinia Cambogia products; however this stuff is the real deal! Sometimes I have to remind myself that I have to eat! It’s very easy to digest and the taste is gental on the ole taste buds. I will definitely be purchasing this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Lennis Brown

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way it controls your appetitie
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way it controls your appetitie,but i dont see any weight loss. I am aware of what I eat and it has reduced my craving. will just wait and see, planning to increase my dosage and keep my fingers crossed

customer_reviews.title: Great weight control product
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for weight control. I was told to take 1500 mg a day and I believe I can see a real difference. It gives me a padded and energy and I plan to continue using it. Thank you bulk supplements.!!!

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to see what happens!
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using for a couple of days so I can't yet comment on the results. I mixed some in a powdered green drink and didn't have any problem with the flavor. I'll update this review when I have used longer.
customer_reviews.author: tnt

customer_reviews.title: I started using this last week and can already tell ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this last week and can already tell a difference in the way I feel and the way my clothes fit. No jitters or ill effects at all. I added green tea extract to the mix today, obviously too soon to tell any difference but I believe the products will work well together.
customer_reviews.author: DYFlores

customer_reviews.title: High quality // good results
customer_reviews.text: No bad taste, and goes down great. Take about 2 to 3 times a day and it takes the edge off of hunger. Perfect at work when it's easy to eat poorly or too much. Will be purchasing again.Always a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Decreases Appetite
customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous supplements from BulkSupplements, and as usual, I am very satisified with their product, Garcinia Cambogia. I take 500 mg of the supplement 30 - 60 min before a meal and I have noticed that I have a decrease in my appetite which should result in weight loss over time since I eat less each time. I definitely recommend this supplement for anyone who is looking to help lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I love bulksupplements because I can order products I love at ...
customer_reviews.text: The Garcinia Cambodia helps curb my appetite but it doesn't mix well with plain water so I only gave it 4 stars. I love bulksupplements because I can order products I love at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Geminirish

customer_reviews.title: I've only been taking these for about 2 weeks now ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking these for about 2 weeks now. I have noticed a difference in my energy as well as suppressing my appetite. So far I've only lost 3 lbs, but 2 weeks may not be enough time for more than that. My only complaint is that several of the capsules were broken in the bag leaving the rest of the capsules covered in garcinia cambogia powder.

customer_reviews.title: This plant may not work as touted
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time, but so far the supplement hasn't helped control my appetite at all. Every other supplement I have ordered from BulkSupplements has been great.

customer_reviews.title: works well, but isn't a miracle pill
customer_reviews.text: This product works well suppressing appetite, it isn't a miracle worker but it does a decent job suppressing my appetite.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great appetite suppressant. Being a large man Im using a bit larger doses than suggested. Have no side effects, controls appetite very well.

customer_reviews.title: weight loss
customer_reviews.text: no taste, easy to digest, works great would recommend this product to anyone wanting to control their appetite and lose weight

customer_reviews.title: 5 pounds down after 10 days
customer_reviews.text: At about 10 days in I'm down about 5 pounds. Is this due to a placebo effect or real? My weakness are sweets after meals. This seems to make me full faster. My ideal weight is 160. I'm about 174. Everyone knows the last 15 to 20 pounds is the hardest. So the real test is coming. So far I have avoided pretty much all sweets. That is a miracle for me. So far so good.

customer_reviews.text: Best value for the money. I think it is better when the product is not pilled and processed and closer to it"s nature state. My gym members love to add to smoothies.

customer_reviews.title: Working well!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using the BulkSupplements brand of Garcinia Cambogia. In the past I've used various other brands such as Nature 365 and Creative Bioscience-in pill form. The BulkSupplements Pure Garcinia Cambogia is less expensive and, in my opinion, starts to act quicker and lasts longer. I take 1/2 tsp. before meals and my usually VERY hearty appetite is well-controlled and the effect lasts for approximately 4-5 hours. I have also detected a slight aversion to food after I've eaten--which is good. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie C.

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED WITH THE RESULTS, AND THE SAVINGS!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my second order. I've been using GC for seven months now, and have lost over 70 lbs. Buying the BulkSupplements is much cheaper! I will definitely continue to purchase this product as well as their Pure Stevia.

customer_reviews.text: I had heard so many conflicting reviews I figured I'd at least try it. For me it works perfectly! It helps control my cravings during the day which is huge for me. Taken properly and combined with green coffee bean extract, I have been able to lose over 20 lbs in 2 months! This one also has little taste so it can be mixed right in with water!!

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately I noticed that the zip lock fastener was not ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for less that a week, but I can already notice a reduction in my appetite. No problem mixing it into my fruit and vegetable smoothies. I do not notice any objectionable flavor. The only problem I had was with the zip lock packaging. Fortunately I noticed that the zip lock fastener was not sealed before breaking the tear-away seal. I was able to shake the powder back into the bag before opening it. I then had to clean-out the zip lock before sealing the bag. Watch out for this problem so that you do not have product powder everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product gets 5 stars because it works ! I had used another product from what I Have always considered a very fine herb co and it did work also but it only took the edge off hunger and didn't last long . This is more an appetite suppressant and lasts longer than the other I got . I tried BulkSupplements because I had gotten another product from them that was really superior ( stevia ). I'll definitely keep buying from this company...I have used herbs for many , many years , so I 'm familiar with tons of brands . Can't believe I had never heard of BulkSupplements before !
